alert.note: Alert for Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 5:55PM EDT until March 28 at 12:01AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Little River near Eatonton affecting Putnam County. For the Little River...including Newborn, Eatonton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little River near Eatonton. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 22 feet, Minor flooding continues to expand into the woodlands and fields along the river of the Oconee National Forest upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 16 or Monticello Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM EDT Monday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:45 PM EDT Monday was 22.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 16.7 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 20 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
